name: Soul Master
storyline:
This game is set in the magical world of Aster, which is said to have been created by mages long ago.
It is closed off by a wall of fog, and cat people with superior magical abilities reflect and coexist with monsters.
You have come to this magic academy in order to become the strongest mage "Soul Master".
You dream of passing the entrance exam, graduating in one year with excellent grades, and becoming a Soul Master.
summary:
The player enters a magic school as an apprentice wizard.
The player is sent to an area where monsters are running rampant and exterminate them.
The monsters are placed at the top of a pyramid, and the four players advance from the four corners to the top.
The first player to exterminate the monsters wins the game.
